text: Hello, I am here to talk to you about the organization Save the Children
Ok, tell me about it.
Save the Children is a not-for-profit organization dedicated to ensure each and every child's rights to health, education, safety, etc.
Do you work for Save the Children?
No, but I am a huge advocate for the alienable rights of children and decided to spread the word about the organization in order to gain more traction for the work.
What countries does Save the Children provide services in?

Currently, Save the Children all around the globe, from the United States to Haiti, to Bangladesh, Bolivia, etc. In fact, you can sponsor an individual child from a certain country, and help provide them with the sustenance they need to simply survive.
Well I think it is a noble task you are doing.

Thank you for very much. I was just curious if you would like to help a child in need and donate some of your task payment money  to Save the Children. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
I would like to split it - $1 for Save the Children and $1 for me.
That is very kind of you! These children are very grateful for people like you. People who care
I am not the most charitable person but it is something...
And something it is! You don't know how many people would not even think twice about helping those in need. You are part of the solution for these problems. Thank you
So I guess that's it for this task. Good luck with the others you are talking to.
Thank you. I just have one more question... What was the deciding factor that convinced you to donate to Save the Children?
Well the money was right there... And I do think it is a worthy cause. So it was a pretty easy decision.
That's awesome. Thank you once again for your contribution. The research team will collect the donation and send it straight to Save the Children.
Ok. Have a good afternoon.
Thank you! You as well!
I don't see an option to submit, so I assume that is done on your end.
